api.name: ObLanguageService
api.usage: This service is automatically instantiated by the ObMasterLayoutService. Each module where the MatDatePicker is used should call its setLocaleOnAdapter to ensure the date picker uses the correct locale.

variables.name: locale$
variables.text: Emits the current locale when the language changes

methods.name: setLocaleOnAdapter
methods.text: Automatically sets the current locale to the given date adapter. Used to define the locale for the Datepicker.

api.name: ObDate
api.usage: This pipe automatically listens to locale changes and formats the date accordingly

methods.name: transform
methods.text: Formats a date according to current locale and given format and timezone.
